To continue with the climate change topic I posted a few days ago.. I feel obliged to explain further how our species have greatly damaged the world.

Civilization as we know it was built by wars and religions. We know these facts from our history classes. Our country the Philippines identifies itself from the religion it acquired from Spain in 1521. Catholic influence in governing
Economies were built in pursuit of power and profit.

A lot of my understanding of the issues in climate change were fortified with my experiences living in the islands for more than a year and acquiring a better understanding of the science of physics and astronomy - the language of the natural world.

This is the greatest threat to our existence and I feel the urgency of spreading knowledge and insights.
